allmark_tooltip.message:
click: Mark all feeds as seen
shift-click: Mark all feeds as read

allread_tooltip.message:
click: Open all unseen items
shift-click: Open all unread items

available_feeds_tooltip.description: Tooltip on icon of Available Feeds section
available_feeds_tooltip.message:
List of feeds available in open tabs. Click to add.
unsubscribed: $unsubscribed$, subscribed: $subscribed$

extDesc.message: Your RSS/Atom feeds as bookmarks and a whole lot more

feed_home_tooltip.message: Open the feed's home page in a tab

feed_tooltip_error.description: Error message on tooltip on feed icon

feed_tooltip_items.description: Item-related tooltip on a feed icon

feed_tooltip_pubdate.description: Publication date on tooltip on a feed icon

feed_tooltip_ttl.description: TTL tooltip on a feed icon

feed_tooltip_upd.description: Next update tooltip on a feed icon

group_tooltip_errors.description: Error-related tooltip on a group icon

group_tooltip_feeds.description: Feed-related tooltip on a group icon

group_tooltip_items.description: Item-related tooltip on a group icon

icon_1_feed_error.description: RSSLL Icon tooltip - one feed in error

icon_1_feed_updated.description: RSSLL Icon tooltip - one feed updated

icon_n_feeds_error.description: RSSLL Icon tooltip - n feeds in error

icon_n_feeds_updated.description: RSSLL Icon tooltip - n feeds updated

import_error.message: Import data does not appear to have been exported from another RSS Live Links installation

item_pubdate_tag.description: Tag on an item's tooltip when displaying a publication date

left_arrow_tooltip.description: Tooltip on left arrow in hids-others-on-open mode
left_arrow_tooltip.message:
Switch to previous unseen feed
Shift: switch to previous feed

mark_read_tooltip.message:
Mark all items as read and close the feed
(ctrl-click to keep open)

multiple_feeds_loading.description: Message displayed when more than one feed is loading

no_available_feeds.description: Content of Available Feeds section when no feeds have been detected
no_available_feeds.message: No feeds are available in your currently open tabs

no_feeds.description: Message displayed when no feeds have been configured (e.g. a fresh installation
no_feeds.message: You currently have no feeds configured

one_feed_loading.description: Message displayed when one feed is loading

open_help_tooltip.message: Open the RSS Live Links help information in a tab

open_options_tooltip.message: Open the options page in a tab

open_tooltip.message:
click: Open unseen in tabs
shift-click: Open unread in tabs
alt-click: Open all in tabs

opt_addButtonHelp.message: Click to manually subscribe to a new feed

opt_advancedOptionsHelp.message: Options that you should probably leave alone, but can play with at your own risk.

opt_alreadySubscribed.message: You have already subscribed to this feed url

opt_animateButtonHelp.message: Animate the RSS Live Links button when feed updates have been found

opt_askOnUpdateHelp.message: Ask before refreshing an open feed when updates have been found

opt_autoopenNewHelp.message: Automatically open new items as they arrive. CAUTION: only use this option on infrequently updated feeds!

opt_availablesHelp.message:
Feeds found in open tabs.
Click to subscribe.
Shift-Click to open the feed URL

opt_badConfig.message: the config data is not valid

opt_badOPML.message: the OPML data is not valid

opt_changesUnseenHelp.message: Whether or not a change in an exiting item's content will be cause the item to be re-marked as unseen.

opt_changesUnseenLabel.message: Mark items as unseen on content change

opt_configHelp.message:
EXPORT: click the 'Get Config for Export' button, select all (using the context menu), copy the selection (using the context menu), and paste into a text editor (e.g. notepad).

IMPORT: open a file of previously exported data in a text editor (e.g. notepad), select all, copy to the clipboard, paste into the text box below, then click on 'Import Config'.

opt_defaultTimeoutHelp.message: The default timeout, in seconds, to apply to web requests for feed data

opt_defaultTtlHelp.message: The default 'Time to live' value for feeds that use TTL-based refresh intervals

opt_displayOptionsHelp.message:
Set whether new items should appear first,
whether or not to hide other feed titles when one feed is open,
whether to update an open feed or notify of pending updates instead,
whether or not to automatically open the first feed in the pop-up,
whether or not to use animation and sound notification, and
various default limits used by RSS Live Links

opt_duplicateGroupName.message: A group by the name '$name$' already exists

opt_feedFontsHelp.message: The font family and size for feed titles, and font characteristics to use for each seen-state

opt_feedNetworkTimeoutHelp.message:
The timeout, in seconds, to apply to requests for this feed's data.
Specify 0 to use the default value.

opt_feedRefreshTimeHelp.message:
The number of minutes between each refresh of the feed data.
Use 'TTL' to use the TTL tag value in the data itself.

opt_feedSortItemsHelp.message: The criteria to use to sort this feed's items

opt_fixPopupClosesBugHelp.message: Works around the problem whereby the pop-up closes on each item click, by delaying the opening of tabs until you deliberately close the pop-up.

opt_focusFirstTabHelp.message: Focus the first tab opened by the pop-up when the popup is closed

opt_getConfigHelp.message: Click, or drag, to export your configuration into a file

opt_getOPMLHelp.message: Click, or drag, to export your subscriptions into a file, as OPML

opt_groupsButtonHelp.message:
Remove a group,
rename a group,
or move selected group up or down in the list

opt_groupsHelp.message:
Defined feed groups
Click to select
Double-Click to modify

opt_hideOnOpenHelp.message: Hide all closed feed titles when a feed is opened

opt_importCnfMsg.description: The entire body of the import confirmation dialog, including HTML markup
opt_importCnfMsg.message:
Do you wish to
  • MERGE the imported configuration with the exisiting configuration, or
  • REPLACE the exisitng configuration with the imported configuration?

opt_importConfigHelp.message: Click, or drop a file, to import a configuration or OPML file

opt_itemFontsHelp.message: The font family and size for item titles, and font characteristics to use for each seen-state

opt_maintainBadgeHelp.message: Whether or not to show and maintain the icon badge that notifies of feed updates

opt_maxConcurrentHelp.message: The maximum number of update requests to run concurrently

opt_maxItemsCountHelp.message: The maximum number of items that are shown for each feed

opt_newAtTopHelp.message: Reorder the feed items so that all unseen items appear at the top of the list

opt_newtWorkOptionsHelp.message:
Limit the number of concurrent update requests,
specify the default request timeout,
specify the default 'time-to-live'

opt_notificationOptionsHelp.message: Configure notification sound and icon animation

opt_openFirstHelp.message: Automatically open the first feed in the list with unseen items when opening the pop-up

opt_playSoundHelp.message: Play a sound when feed updates have been found

opt_popupDensityHelp.message: Set the density of the item lines in the pop-up

opt_popupHeightHelp.message: Set the maximum height of the popup in pixels

opt_popupWidthHelp.message: Set the width of the popup in pixels

opt_showAvailableHelp.message: Whether or not to show the Available Feeds link in the pop-up

opt_singleItemHelp.message: Close the popup on opening the first item (use ctrl-click to keep the pop-up open)

opt_sortItemsHelp.description: Help on default sort items option
opt_sortItemsHelp.message: The default criteria to use to sort feed items

opt_sortItemsLabel.description: Label on default sort items option

opt_soundFileHelp.message: The notification sound to play (choose a new one to hear it)

opt_subsButtonHelp.message:
Unsubscribe from selected feeds, 
modify selected feed,
or move selected feed up or down in the list

opt_subscriptionsHelp.message:
Feeds to which you have subscribed
Click to select
Double-Click to modify

opt_unlimitedCallsHelp.message: No limit on the number of update requests that can run concurrently

opt_unlimitedItemsHelp.message: No limit on the number of items that are shown for each feed

opt_updateAvailableHelp.message: Click to refresh the list of available feeds

opt_useAvailableIconHelp.message: When unsubscribed available feeds are found, use the alternative button image

opt_useBookmarkFolderHelp.message: Whether or not this feed should have a bookmark folder associated with it

opt_useGroupsHelp.message: Whether to display feed groups in the pop-up

opt_useWebWorkerHelp.message: Perform updates in a background thread. This MAY improve responsiveness of the pop-up (especially if you have more than about 30 feeds), but WILL triple the memory usage of RSS Live Links.

opt_useWebWorkerLabel.message: Perform updates in background thread (Restart required)

right_arrow_tooltip.description: Tooltip on right arrow in hids-others-on-open mode
right_arrow_tooltip.message:
Switch to next unseen feed
Shift: switch to next feed

subscribe_already.description: Message displayed when subscription dialog is called on URL that is already subscribed
subscribe_already.message:
RSS Live Links is already subscribed to this URL as

 $name$

subscribe_dlg_text.description: Text in the subscription adder dialog
subscribe_dlg_text.message: Enter a name for your new subscription

subscribe_title.description: Title on subscription adder page and dialog

subscribed_feed_tooltip.description: Tooltip on an available feed name when it has already been subscribed to

updates_pending_msg.description: Message when updates are pending on an open feed
updates_pending_msg.message: Updates pending. Click here to refresh

version_msg_x_tooltip.description: Tooltip on the version message close icon

version_updated.description: Message displayed when the extension has been installed or updated
version_updated.message:
You have just installed, or upgraded to,
RSS Live Links version $version$.
Click here to see the release notes.
You can now support the development of RSS Live Links through donations via the options page.
